article.Heading: Budget 2017: Expect revenue growth of 17% in current yr says revenue secy
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Shereen Bhan, Hasmukh Adhia, Revenue Secretary gave his take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and outlook on the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Shereen Bhan, Hasmukh Adhia, Revenue Secretary gave his take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and outlook on the road ahead.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos.
